thread.title: AMIT KALA

author: AMIT KALA
title: AMIT KALA
text:
My initial experience was kinda Ok, had some rough discussions with them initially however you never know, who will be your best charm, I tried 5th time with one of their executive over chat and he was able to help me out with re-scheduling which any or previous executives were not able to do.. That Super Star is Sumit Bhargava.
Thanks to Trip Beam having him on his side..
Cheers Bud.
